channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What’s next for banks amid noise around new overdraft-fee cap
item.description: Consumer groups applauded the move, but banks said customers could be driven toward more expensive options such as payday loans.

item.title: Roth conversions may suddenly seem like a bad idea, but here’s why retirees still are considering them
item.description: There’s more to think about than just current tax rates versus future tax rates.

item.title: RFK Jr. could prove a surprise boon for stem-cell stocks with pivotal year ahead
item.description: Stem-cell research is on the cusp of a breakthrough that could come as soon as 2025, and two biotech companies with promising therapies stand to gain,...

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Rises as Inventories Shrink More Than Expected
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures gained after an EIA report showed that inventories had the biggest weekly withdrawal since January.

item.title: Waiting until age 70 to claim Social Security gets you a lot more money. Here’s why so few people do it.
item.description: The median age at which retirees claim Social Security is age 63.

item.title: Gold Falls After U.S. PPI Data, Jobless Claims
item.description: Gold prices extended losses after a measure of wholesale prices in the U.S. rose more than expected in November, while jobless claims increased to the...

item.title: U.S. Stocks Fall as Adobe Tumbles
item.description: U.S. stock indexes were lower. Shares of Adobe tumbled while November’s producer-price index rose 0.4% from October.

item.title: Activist Starboard Value Takes Stake in Bitcoin-Mining Company Riot
item.description: Starboard wants Riot to convert some of its bitcoin-mining facilities into space for big data-center users.

item.title: Egg prices soar — beef too — and deliver inflation shock to grocery shoppers
item.description: Food prices post their biggest increase in almost two years.

item.title: Treasury Yields Decline on Jobs, Inflation Data
item.description: Treasury yields fell as U.S. initial jobless claims rose more than expected last week.
